text: The 1931–32 NHL season was the fifteenth season of the National Hockey League. Eight teams played 48 games each. The Toronto Maple Leafs swept the New York Rangers in three games for the Stanley Cup. ==Regular season== ===Final standings=== Note: W = Wins, L = Losses, T = Ties, Pts = Points, GF = Goals For, GA =
